price: 130. Dan jika keduanya bercerai, maka Allah akan memberi kecukupan kepada masing-masing dari karunia-Nya. Dan Allah Mahaluas (karunia-Nya), Mahabijaksana.
arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلّٗا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yatafarraqā yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min saʿatihi wakāna al-lahu wāsiʿan ḥakīman
